title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not result in it receiving focus.
EB: The first Combo should receive focus when clicked upon.
SR: To reproduce: Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. Press 'Tab' and observe that the focus goes to the second Combo labeled 'Repository Path:'.
